TopicTitle: Quick Question on Mod Use / Crashes

Articles.Content:
I've run KSP Vanilla rock solid for about a month.  Just added the latest 1.9.x capable KAC and it ran fine for several hours.  Then I added TWP (1.7.2.0 - the latest).  Game ran fine for a couple of hours, and I experienced my first CTD.

Likely culprit is the latest mod.

So... if I simply delete TWP from the directory, should that fix everything?  ... or will the fact that I have a resident node in KAC derived from a TWP input likely keep things messed up?

 

Thanks for any thoughts.
